Trigger.name: Hiru
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == "you" then system.hunting.vars.targetName = matches[3] system.hunting.vars.attacking = true end
if system.hunting.funcs.isHuntingTarget(matches[3]) then system.hunting.funcs.razeShield() end

regexCodeList.string: ^Whirling .+ in a tight arc, (you) bring the weapon around to crash into the side of the head of (.+)\.$
^Snapping back into a ready stance, (you) whirl .+ in a long sweep at the head of (.+)\.$
^(\w+) whips .+ in a tight arc, sweeping it at the head of (.+)\.$
^Snapping back into a ready stance, (\w+) whips .+ in a wide arc at the head of (.+)\.$
